author: Monica Sisavat
title: Viola Davis and Julius Tennon at the 2017 Oscars | POPSUGAR Celebrity
text:
Viola Davis and Julius Tennon at the 2017 Oscars Viola Davis Doesn't Need Luck at the Oscars, She Has Husband Julius Tennon February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Viola Davis Doesn't Need Luck at the Oscars, She Has Husband Julius Tennon 
There were plenty of gorgeous couples at Sunday's Oscars , but one of our favorites was definitely Viola Davis and Julius Tennon. The couple of nearly 14 years was all smiles as they made their way down the red carpet, and Julius was clearly aware of how beautiful his wife looked, because he stepped aside and obliged photographers with some solo shots of her. Viola is the first black actress to receive three Oscar nominations, so fingers crossed she strikes gold tonight!
